sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Apple ( AAPL ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.7%.
Year to date, Apple registers a 19.5% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Chemours ( CC ), trading down 2.1%.
Chemours is lower by about 38.8% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.9%, and Visa ( V ), trading up 1.4% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
